files.help:
Providing exact path to file via _--style_ (_-style_) flag is supported since version 14, but some repositories (Arch Linux repositories, for example) still don't have that version.

With version 14 or higher move file to _"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/clang-format_ and place this shell script with name "clang-format" to some directory in _"$PATH"_, preceding _/usr/bin/_ (I suggest _"$HOME"/.local/bin/_ or _/usr/local/bin/_):
```bash
#!/usr/bin/env sh

CONFIG_FILE_PATH="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/clang-format

style_arg_set() {
    for arg in "$@"
    do
        case "$arg" in
            -style*|--style*)
                return 0
        esac
    done
    return 1
}

if style_arg_set "$@"
then
    /usr/bin/clang-format "$@"
else
    /usr/bin/clang-format --style=file:"$CONFIG_FILE_PATH" "$@"
fi
```
